PhD Student

News About

Started Elmezzi Graduate School of Molecular Medicine

I have started my PhD under the supervision of Drs. Stephan Bickel and Ashesh Mehta at Human Brain Mapping Lab within Feinstein Institutes for Medical Research.

I study speech perception with a focus on neural oscillations and electrical stimulation using intracranial EEG.

Written on June 1, 2019
